statements: DELETE FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE adherence_to_standards = true;
DELETE FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE vendor_id = 123 AND vendor_name = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE certifications = 'ISO 9001' AND adherence_to_standards = TRUE;
DELETE FROM vendor_compliance WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Inc.' AND certification_status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM VendorCompliance WHERE regulatory_requirements = 'GDPR compliance' AND compliance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Compliance WHERE status = 'Not Compliant';
DELETE FROM VendorCompliance WHERE vendor_id = 100 AND status_id = 1
